constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All applications for developments likely to attract birds or connected with an aviation use.Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Erection of single storey side extension and detached outbuilding to be used as office/gym at rear of property
decision_conditions: The proposed erection of single storey side extension and detached outbuilding to be used as office/gym at rear of property falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A and E of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Conditions 3 (Materials) - Officers have reviewed the information submitted and are satisfied this can now be approved.

I acknowledge receipt of your payment for £174.00, however, the fee required for this pre-application is £360.00, therefore please forward the outstanding balance of £190.00 as soon as possible.Note: Payment can be made online via the Kingston council website, via our Contact Centre on 020 8547 5002, or by cheque made payable to Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames
